fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Shoot someone during the day, dealing a Basic attack to them. (1 day cooldown)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
**Cripple MOAB**
- Attack upgraded to Powerful. The target will be functionally dead and cannot speak, but will still appear alive and a valid target until the end of the day. Anyone who whispers them while they're dead will have their defense reduced to Vulnerable the next night.
- Gain a new night ability that roleblocks a target and gives them Protection Immunity for two nights.
**Supply Drop**
- Attack will also hit a neighbor at random. Attack will always skip over Monkeys.
- Every time a Monkey kills someone, call in an airdrop. The airdrop will have a Kingdom Attack! card that you may then play at any time.
--------------------------
- You may only choose one upgrade, outlined in bold. You cannot choose an upgrade until you kill two people with your ability.
